ModMetaData.name: Gene Remover Continued
ModMetaData.author: Nalzurin
ModMetaData.description:
A fan-made update that brings Gene Remover to 1.5. If you find any bugs let me know! It will be taken down if requested by the original author. Original mod link https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3179374362 Original Description:
An endgame solution to removing unwanted genes. Build a gene remover, cutting edge technology that allows isolation and termination of certain genes.
In order to build one, a techprint must be acquired and the research project completed. Pawns who undergo gene removal will suffer from "genes regrowing" debuff for a while, actual duration is determined by metabolic efficiency of the targeted gene (can be changed in mod settings).
Many thanks to Daniel for providing sources for their "Gene Ripper" mod.
